game.name: The Night Job: Hotel
game.shortDescription: The Night Job: Hotel is a first-person horror game about surviving five terrifying nights in an old hotel. Complete your tasks, avoid the entities that haunt the halls, and keep the place running after dark. Stay alert. Stay moving. Stay alive.
